***оладья.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:оладья.html>ола́дья</a> (23375)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv"><a href = vnd.unilang:оладья.html>ола́дья</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">oladĭja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span><span id="attentionseekingorv" class="attentionseeking" lang="orv" title="spellcheck"></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek"><a href = vnd.unilang:ancient.html>Ancient</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:greek.html>Greek</a></a></span> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc">ἐλάδιον</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">eládion</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>diminutive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc">ἔλαιον</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">élaion</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:oil.html>oil</a>, olive-oil</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оладья.html>ола́дья</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">oládʹja</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оладья.html>ола́дьи</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оладья.html>ола́дьи</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оладья.html>ола́дий</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>diminutive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ола́дик</b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ладить.html>ла́дь</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a></b>

Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-оладьj-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-я</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:оладья.html>ола́дьи</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>они</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всё</a> подгорали <a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>неё</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:красный.html>кра́сная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:огонь.html>огня́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>она</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:гневный.html>гневно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кричать.html>крича́ла</a>: — <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:чертить.html>черти́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бы.html>бы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>вас</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:взять.html>взя́ли</a>… <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>И</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вдруг.html>вдруг</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:понюхать.html>поню́хав</a> сковороду, <a href = vnd.unilang:потемнеть.html>потемне́ла</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:швырнуть.html>швырну́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сковородник.html>сковоро́дник</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пол.html>пол</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:завыть.html>завы́ла</a>: — Ба-атюшки, сковорода-то скоромная, <a href = vnd.unilang:поганый.html>пога́ная</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:выжечь.html>вы́жгла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ведь.html>ведь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>её</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> чистый-то <a href = vnd.unilang:понедельник.html>понеде́льник</a>, го-осподи! <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%93%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%8C%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9,_%D0%9C%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%BC" class="extiw" title="w:Горький, Максим">Максим <a href = vnd.unilang:горький.html>Го́рький</a></a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>лю́дях</a>», <span class="example-date">1915—1916</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; ***олений.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:олений.html>оле́ний</a> (13098)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:deer.html>deer</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:reindeer.html>reindeer</a>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>ле́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ний</b>

Зализняка — местоименное <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> 6*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.

***оленина.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:оленина.html>оленина</a> (25499)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оленина.html>олени́на</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">olenína</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оленина.html>олени́ны</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оленина.html>олени́ны</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оленина.html>олени́н</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>venison</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́нь</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">olénʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олений.html>оле́ний</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">olénij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>ле́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>ле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-олен-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ин</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="кулинарный термин">кулин.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:мясо.html>мя́со</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́ня</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:употребляемый.html>употребля́емое</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пища.html>пищу</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

***олениха.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:олениха.html>олениха</a> (14277)</h1><br><h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>ле́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ха.html>ха</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>ле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ха.html>ха</a></b>

***олень.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>олень</a> (3004)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*(<a href = vnd.unilang:j.html>j</a>)elenь</i>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*h₁el-(h₁)<a href = vnd.unilang:en-.html>en-</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:red.html>red</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:deer.html>deer</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:elk.html>elk</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*h₁el-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:red.html>red</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:deer.html>deer</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:elk.html>elk</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:whence.html>whence</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:english.html>English</a> <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href = vnd.unilang:elk.html>elk</a></i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:cognate.html>Cognate</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek"><a href = vnd.unilang:ancient.html>Ancient</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:greek.html>Greek</a></a></span> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc">ἑλλός</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">hellós</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">deer-calf</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc">ἔλαφος</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">élaphos</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lithuanian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Lithuanian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:lithuanian.html>Lithuanian</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="lt">elnias</i>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Classical_Armenian" class="extiw" title="w:Classical Armenian"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:armenian.html>Armenian</a></a></span> <i class="Armn mention" lang="xcl">եղն</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="xcl-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ełn</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́нь</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">olénʹ</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́ня</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́ни</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́ней</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:deer.html>deer</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:северный.html>се́верный</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́нь</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">sévernyj <b>olénʹ</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:reindeer.html>reindeer</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:американский.html>америка́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:северный.html>се́верный</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́нь</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">amerikánskij sévernyj <b>olénʹ</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:caribou.html>caribou</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">безро́гий <b><a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́нь</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">bezrógij <b>olénʹ</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:pollard.html>pollard</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:благородный.html>благоро́дный</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́нь</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">blagoródnyj <b>olénʹ</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:stag.html>stag</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:red.html>red</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:deer.html>deer</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:elk.html>elk</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:u.html>U</a>.<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>S</a>.) (Cervus elaphus)</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:настоящий.html>настоя́щий</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́нь</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">nastojáščij <b>olénʹ</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:stag.html>stag</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:red.html>red</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:deer.html>deer</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:elk.html>elk</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:u.html>U</a>.<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>S</a>.) (Cervus elaphus)</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:buck.html>buck</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:stag.html>stag</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:male.html>male</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:deer.html>deer</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a><span class="ib-comma">,</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:derogatory.html>derogatory</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:dimwit.html>dimwit</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:fool.html>fool</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:narrow-minded.html>narrow-minded</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:individual.html>individual</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олений.html>оле́ний</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">olénij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оленина.html>олени́на</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">olenína</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:лень.html>ле́нь</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 2a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-олень-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="зоологическое">зоол.</span> парнокопытное <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:семейство.html>семе́йства</a> оленевых <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ветвистый.html>ветви́стыми</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рог.html>рога́ми</a> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:лата.html>ла́т</a>. <span lang="la"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman, Arial Unicode MS, Lucida Sans Unicode, MS Mincho, Arial, sans-serif;">Cervus</span></span></i>) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:идти.html>Шёл</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:город.html>го́родом</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>оди́н</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:юноша.html>ю́ноша</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:увидеть.html>уви́дел</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:олень.html>оле́ня</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>тако́го</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рослый.html>ро́слого</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:красивый.html>краси́вого</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>тех</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пора.html>по́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:видывать.html>ви́дывал</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%93%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%88%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%92%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B4_%D0%9C%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Гаршин, Всеволод Михайлович"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. ***оливковый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:оливковый.html>оли́вковый</a> (22513)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оливка.html>оли́вка</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">olívka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-овый</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ovyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оливковый.html>оли́вковый</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">olívkovyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:relational.html>relational</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:olive.html>olive</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:оливковый.html>оли́вковое</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:масло.html>ма́сло</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>olívkovoje</b> máslo</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:olive.html>olive</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:oil.html>oil</a></span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:olive.html>olive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:green.html>green</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:color.html>color</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">оли́ва</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">olíva</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оливка.html>оли́вка</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">olívka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:оливковый.html>оли́вковый</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-олив-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-к-ов</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:связанный.html>свя́занный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:соотносящийся.html>соотнося́щийся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́нию</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>существи́тельным</a> олива, <a href = vnd.unilang:оливка.html>оли́вка</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:добывать.html>добыва́емый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:оливка.html>оли́вок</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:оливье.html>оливье́</a> (26918)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language"><a href = vnd.unilang:french.html>French</a></a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:give.html>given</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:name.html>name</a> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr">Olivier</i>,

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:олигарх.html>олига́рх</a> (19532)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>га́рх</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-олигарх-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:представитель.html>представи́тель</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:олигархия.html>олига́рхии</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>Ни</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>оди́н</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:олигарх.html>олига́рх</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:залезть.html>зале́з</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:карман.html>карман</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>одному́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рядовой.html>рядово́му</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:россиянин.html>россия́нину</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i>Елена Костюк, «Сверхбедные <a href = vnd.unilang:против.html>про́тив</a> сверхбогатых» // «<a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>Вре́мя</a> МН», <span class="example-date">2003</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

***олигархия.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:олигархия.html>олига́рхия</a> (26959)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek"><a href = vnd.unilang:ancient.html>Ancient</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:greek.html>Greek</a></a></span> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc">ὀλιγαρχία</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">oligarkhía</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олигархия.html>олига́рхия</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">oligárxija</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олигархия.html>олига́рхии</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олигархия.html>олига́рхии</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олигархия.html>олига́рхий</a></b>)

<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:избранный.html>и́збранный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:круг.html>круг</a> кого-либо, какого-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:общество.html>о́бщества</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:среда.html>среды</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> т. п. <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>Но</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:последний.html>после́днее</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:пока.html>пока́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:возвращение.html>возвраще́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:политический.html>полити́ческий</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

***олимпиада.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:олимпиада.html>олимпиа́да</a> (9752)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

***олимпийский.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:олимпийский.html>олимпи́йский</a> (7207)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">оли́мпия</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">Olímpija</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-и́йский</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-íjskij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олимпийский.html>олимпи́йский</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">olimpíjskij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:olympic.html>Olympic</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:olympus.html>Olympus</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:olympian.html>Olympian</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:олимпийский.html>олимпи́йские</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:игра.html>и́гры</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Olimpíjskije</b> ígry</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:olympic.html>Olympic</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:game.html>games</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:олимпийский.html>олимпи́йское</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:спокойствие.html>споко́йствие</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>olimpíjskoje</b> spokójstvije</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:olympian.html>Olympian</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:calm.html>calm</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>лим<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>пи́й<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ский</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 3a✕~.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-олимп-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-ий-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ск</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***олин.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:олин.html>о́лин</a> (20557)</h1><br><h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

***олицетворявший.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:олицетворять.html>олицетворя́вший</a> (17709)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олицетворять.html>олицетворя́вший</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">olicetvorjávšij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:past.html>past</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:active.html>active</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олицетворять.html>олицетворя́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">olicetvorjátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:олицетворять.html>олицетворя́вший</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:действительный.html>Действи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:причастие.html>прича́стие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:прошедший.html>проше́дшего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мени</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>действ. прич. прош. вр.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:олицетворять.html>олицетворя́ть</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***олицетворять.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:олицетворять.html>олицетворя́ть</a> (17709)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>це<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тво<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ря́ть</b>

Зализняка — 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — олицетворить.

***олово.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:олово.html>о́лово</a> (21200)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*olovo</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:lead.html>lead</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о́</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>ло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>во</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-олов-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-о</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="химическое">хим.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:химический.html>хими́ческий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:элемент.html>элеме́нт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:атомный.html>а́томным</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:номер.html>но́мером</a> 50, <a href = vnd.unilang:обозначаться.html>обознача́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:химический.html>хими́ческим</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:символ.html>си́мволом</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:sn.html>Sn</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:белый.html>белый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:блестящий.html>блестя́щий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:металл.html>мета́лл</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>

***оловянный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:оловянный.html>оловя́нный</a> (14043)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">оловѧнꙑи</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">olovęnyi</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">оловѣнꙑи</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">olověnyi</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*olověnъ</i>, <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*olověnьnъ</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*olovo</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:lead.html>lead</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*-ěnъ</i>.
</p>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оловянный.html>оловя́нный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">olovjánnyj</span>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>ло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>вя́н<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-олов-</b>; суффикс: <b>-янн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><a href = vnd.unilang:сделанный.html>сде́ланный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:изготовленный.html>изгото́вленный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:олово.html>о́лова</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>Одна́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пуговица.html>пу́говица</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>была</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:оловянный.html>оловя́нная</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:солдатский.html>солда́тская</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:сзади.html>сза́ди</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пришитый.html>приши́т</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:поясок.html>поясо́к</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%90%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%84%D1%8C%D0%B5%D0%B2,_%D0%92%D0%B8%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80_%D0%9F%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Астафьев, Виктор Петрович"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. <h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

***олух.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:рыжий.html>олух</a> (22535)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:рыжий.html>о́лух</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">ólux</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олух.html>о́луха</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олух.html>о́лухи</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:олух.html>о́лухов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:blockhead.html>blockhead</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:dimwit.html>dimwit</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:stupid.html>stupid</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:person.html>person</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о́</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>лух</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-олух-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ольшаник.html>ольша́ник</a> (27699)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ольхо́вник</span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">olʹxóvnik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>оль<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ша.html>ша́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:никнуть.html>ни́к</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-ольш-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-а-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ник</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:ольховый.html>ольхо́вый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:заросль.html>за́росль</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ольха.html>ольхи</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:однако.html>Одна́ко</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:со.html>со</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́менем</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:этот.html>э́ту</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:каменный.html>ка́менную</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лента.html>ле́нту</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всём</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>её</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:протяжение.html>протяже́нии</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> астра​ханских <a href = vnd.unilang:камыш.html>камыше́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a> беломорской <a href = vnd.unilang:прибрежный.html>прибре́жной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тундра.html>ту́ндры</a> заглуши​ли <a href = vnd.unilang:песок.html>пески́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:степной.html>степны́е</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:трава.html>травы</a>, <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:ольшаник.html>ольша́ники</a></span>, вересняки, <a href = vnd.unilang:душный.html>ду́шный</a> багульный <a href = vnd.unilang:стланик.html>стла́ник</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:да.html>да</a> сырь <a href = vnd.unilang:болотный.html>боло́тных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мох.html>мхов</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i>Крусанов П., «<a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>О</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>лю́дях</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ангел.html>а́нгелах</a>», <span class="example-date">2014</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***омерзительный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:омерзительный.html>омерзи́тельный</a> (11248)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:disgusting.html>disgusting</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:loathsome.html>loathsome</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:sickening.html>sickening</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:revolting.html>revolting</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:гадкий.html>га́дкий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">gádkij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мерзкий.html>ме́рзкий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mérzkij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омерзение.html>омерзе́ние</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">omerzénije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:мера.html>мер</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:зи.html>зи́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тель<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-мерз-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-и-тельн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***омертветь.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:омертветь.html>омертве́ть</a> (24734)</h1><br><h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>мерт<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве́ть</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́лы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — мертветь, омертвевать.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-мертв-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:dan.html>-е</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***омлет.html

***омрачаемый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:омрачаемый.html>омрача́емый</a> (25647)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омрачаемый.html>омрача́емый</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">omračájemyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:present.html>present</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:passive.html>passive</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омрачать.html>омрача́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">omračátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:омрачать.html>омрача́ть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:омрачить.html>омрачи́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-мрач-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***омрачивший.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:омрачивший.html>омрачи́вший</a> (19479)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омрачивший.html>омрачи́вший</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">omračívšij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:past.html>past</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:active.html>active</a> perfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омрачить.html>омрачи́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">omračítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:омрачивший.html>омрачи́вший</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:действительный.html>Действи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:причастие.html>прича́стие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:прошедший.html>проше́дшего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мени</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>действ. прич. прош. вр.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:омрачить.html>омрачи́ть</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol>

</ol>
</body> 
***омрачить.html

<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мрачный.html>мра́чный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">mráčnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-и́ть</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:perhaps.html>perhaps</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">мрачи́ть</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">mračítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:омрачить.html>омрачи́ть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:омрачать.html>омрача́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-мрач-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>о́м<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ский</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 3a✕~.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:связанный.html>свя́занный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:соотносящийся.html>соотнося́щийся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́нию</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>существи́тельным</a> Омск <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

***омут.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>омут</a> (13554)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><span class="maintenance-line" style="color: 777777;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>This</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>etymology</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:missing.html>missing</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:incomplete.html>incomplete</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:please.html>Please</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:add.html>add</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:discuss.html>discuss</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:at.html>at</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:scriptorium.html>scriptorium</a>.)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мут</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">ómut</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мута</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́муты</a></b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>омута́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мутов</a></b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>омуто́в</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><i>(underwater)</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:pool.html>pool</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:slough.html>slough</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тихий.html>ти́хом</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́муте</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чертить.html>черти́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:водиться.html>во́дятся</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> tíxom ómute čerti vódjatsja</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:still.html>still</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:water.html>waters</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:run.html>run</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:deep.html>deep</a></span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:whirlpool.html>whirlpool</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:slough.html>slough</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:толкать.html>толка́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:омут.html>о́мут</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">tolkátʹ <a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> ómut</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:urge.html>urge</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:one.html>one</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:destruction.html>destruction</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о́</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>мут</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-омут-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
